jobDescription: Duties: PURPOSE: Conduct Master data management operations using GDSN and master data management system - STIBO STEP PIM. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:Responsible for managing operational requests to product master dataCollect and maintain product data information like GTINs, weights and dimensions, description etc in the master data management system STIBO PIMMonitor data loads into STIBO PIM on a weekly basis to ensure successful data loadingResponsible for testing new functionality, work with the architect to test and implement enhancements/new functionality as determinedWork with the architect to monitor workflows, run test scripts, clean data objects in the master data management system PIMRun test scripts and document the results following the defined work instructionsDocument and maintain existing work instructions for GDSN and PIM system or others as neededSkills: KEY COMPETENCIES AND SKILLS:Excellent data management skills using excel, MDM toolsProduct information management (preferred: Stibo STEP)Effective analytical, written and verbal communication skillsSelf-starter & independent workerVersatile multitasker (capable of managing multiple tasks)Education: EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:Requires 4 year degree2 - 4 years experience using GDSN and STIBO PIM or other MDM toolsExperience in healthcare/medical device industry a plus
